parseConfig.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import json
4 import sys
5 import rospy
6 
7 if __name__ == "__main__":
8  """ Parses json config file and uploads content to ros param server """
9  def setParameter(param_name, param_value, namespace):
10  """ Sets a ros parameter in a given namespace """
11  rospy.set_param("/{}/{}".format(namespace, param_name), param_value)
12 
13  def parseDict(dictData, namespace):
14  """ Iterates over a dict and replicates it on the ROS parameter server """
15  # Iterate over the keys and store params
16  # If an entry is a dict itself, iterate over it as well
17  for key in dictData:
18  if key == "ParamNamespace":
19  continue
20  entry = dictData[key]
21  if isinstance(entry, dict):
22  parseDict(entry, "{}/{}".format(namespace, key))
23  else:
24  setParameter(key, entry, namespace)
25 
26  # Make sure path to config file was given
27  assert len(sys.argv)>=1, "No path to Config File was given!"
28 
29  # Get path to config file
30  path = str(sys.argv[1])
31  print("Config path is {}".format(path))
32 
33  # Read configuration file containing data
34  with open(path) as json_file:
35  jsonData = json.load(json_file)
36 
37  # Get namespace
38  namespace = jsonData["ParamNamespace"]
39 
40  # Parse dict and add entries to ros parameter server
41  parseDict(jsonData, namespace)
42
